title: Developer brings Android 12L to Raspberry Pi 4 w/ custom ROM
content:
As if bringing Android 12L to the nine-year-old Nexus 7 was not enough, a developer has ported the latest mobile OS build to the Raspberry Pi 4.

moreâ€¦

The post Developer brings Android 12L to Raspberry Pi 4 w/ custom ROM appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A developer has managed to port Android 12L to the Raspberry Pi 4 Model B using an unofficial build of LineageOS 19.1.
